title: Example: Implement Real-time Sync
description:
This is an example task demonstrating the task format. In a real project, this would describe implementing WebSocket-based real-time synchronization between the dashboard and the Git repository.

## Requirements
- Auto-refresh when files change
- WebSocket connection to local server
- Fallback to polling if WebSocket unavailable

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dashboard updates within 2 seconds of file changes
- [ ] Connection status indicator in UI
- [ ] Graceful reconnection on disconnect

comments.author: agent-jarvis
comments.content: This is an example task to demonstrate the task format. Agents can claim this task to practice the workflow.
